statements: SELECT * FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, speech_text FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, sentiment_score, speech_text FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT id, user_id, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, sentiment_score, speech_text FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND speech_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0.0 OR sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, speech_text FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE user_id = 456 AND sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_sentiment_data;
SELECT interaction_id, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiment_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT interaction_id, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE participant_id = 'd275d16a-1857-4d76-b498-6c5c77b41241';
SELECT * FROM emotional_recognition ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, participant_id, sentiment_score, speech_text FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND sentiment_score < 0.3
SELECT interaction_id, emotion_category, confidence_level FROM emotional_recognition WHERE confidence_level > 0.7 ORDER BY confidence_level DESC
SELECT participant_id, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE speech_text LIKE '%happy%'
SELECT interaction_id, participant_id, emotion_category, confidence_level FROM emotional_recognition WHERE emotion_category = 'anger'
SELECT * FROM VoiceSentimentData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT text_transcription FROM VoiceSentimentData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT recording_id, sentiment_score FROM VoiceSentimentData ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpeechInteractions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT recording_id, emotion_category, confidence_level FROM EmotionRecognition WHERE emotion_category = 'Happy';
SELECT * FROM VoiceSentimentData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM EmotionRecognition WHERE confidence_level < 0.3 ORDER BY emotion_id DESC;
SELECT text_transcription, sentiment_score FROM VoiceSentimentData WHERE id = 10;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM SpeechInteractions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmotionRecognition WHERE emotion_category = 'happy' AND recording_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM voice_sentiments;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, other_user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id = 100;
SELECT emotion_name FROM emotions WHERE emotion_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM voice_sentiments ORDER BY recorded_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT users.username, users.age, interactions.interaction_timestamp FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM emotions WHERE emotion_name LIKE '%joy%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM voice_sentiment_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_age FROM speaker_info WHERE speaker_gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM speech_interaction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT emotion_name FROM emotion_labels WHERE emotion_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT sentiment_score, recording_date FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0 ORDER BY recording_date ASC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM speaker_info ORDER BY speaker_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT speech_text, sentiment_score FROM voice_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0 ORDER BY sentiment_score LIMIT 5;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_gender, speaker_age FROM speaker_info WHERE speaker_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY speaker_age LIMIT 5;
SELECT emotion_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM emotion_labels GROUP BY emotion_name ORDER BY total_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT spoken_text, interaction_date FROM speech_interaction WHERE speaker_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
